org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions

Class AuctionThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions.AuctionThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class AuctionThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Auction threads form a pool of threads which sleep when they are not being used. This class runs one thread, to which auctions can be assigned as long as the thread is alive.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Detail

      • assignAuction

        void assignAuction(Auction auction)
        Assign an auction to this thread.
        Parameters:
        auction - The auction which this thread is to run.

      • die

        public void die()
        Kill this auction thread.

      • run

        public void run()
        Run this auction thread until it is told to die. While running, it will process an auction then return to the thread pool and wait until it is assigned another auction.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
